testcase.name: Order Flow Integration Tests (F105) > should show loading and error states
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Rendering > should render panel when isOpen is true
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Rendering > should not render panel when isOpen is false
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Rendering > should display loading spinner while fetching data
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Rendering > should show error message when API fails
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Rendering > should display all payments in table
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Statistics > should display total revenue correctly
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Statistics > should display completed payments amount
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Statistics > should display pending payments amount
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Filtering > should filter payments by search term
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Filtering > should filter payments by transaction ID
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Filtering > should filter payments by status
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Filtering > should filter payments by method
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Filtering > should combine multiple filters
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Payment Operations > should open payment details on view button click
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Payment Operations > should show refund button only for completed payments
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Payment Operations > should process refund with confirmation
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Payment Operations > should not process refund if confirmation cancelled
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Status Badges > should display correct status badge for completed payment
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Status Badges > should display correct status badge for pending payment
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Status Badges > should display correct status badge for failed payment
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Accessibility > should have proper ARIA labels
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Accessibility > should have accessible table structure
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Accessibility > should have descriptive button labels
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Edge Cases > should handle empty payment list
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Edge Cases > should handle very large payment amounts
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Edge Cases > should handle missing transaction ID
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Currency Formatting > should format USD currency correctly
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Currency Formatting > should format decimal places correctly
PaymentManagementPanel (F106) > Date Formatting > should display formatted dates
UserManagementPanel (F102) > Rendering > should render panel when isOpen is true
UserManagementPanel (F102) > Rendering > should not render panel when isOpen is false
UserManagementPanel (F102) > Rendering > should display loading spinner while fetching data
UserManagementPanel (F102) > Rendering > should show error message when API fails
UserManagementPanel (F102) > Rendering > should display all users in table
UserManagementPanel (F102) > User Interactions > should filter users by search term
UserManagementPanel (F102) > User Interactions > should filter users by role
UserManagementPanel (F102) > User Interactions > should filter users by status
UserManagementPanel (F102) > User Interactions > should open create modal on add button click
